text: J. William Smith (October 31, 1868 – August 8, 1937) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Kings County from 1925 to 1935. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1868 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs Category:People from Kings County, New Brunswick
title: J. William Smith
